headline: Prudential Financial (NYSE:PRU) Completes $250M Buyback As Q1 Net Income Declines
summary: Prudential Financial (NYSE:PRU) announced its earnings for the first quarter of 2025, reporting a net income decrease to $707 million from $1,138 million the previous year, coupled with a share buyback of 2.2 million shares. This buyback could add weight to the market's overall 2.7% rise, despite a broader positive trend in technology stocks driving indices, reflecting a consistent market uptrend. Although Prudential's 1.1% price move last week aligns with the market's general performance, it...

headline: Prudential Financial Q1 Earnings Beat Estimates on Lower Expenses
summary: PRU's Q1 results reflect higher asset management fees, improved assets under management and lower expenses, offset by lower net investment spread results.
